QuestData.Title: Obliterating Ogres
QuestData.Description: We got more of those magic tossing ogres here which is never a good thing.$b$bThese new ogres are especially bossy and have increased work being done here.$b$bDo you know what stops ogres from working hard? Dying.$b$bKill some ogres here and get this camp back to its normal boring self.
QuestData.RewardText: Great! They are pretty scared now. Its hard to do research when you are afraid of being stabbed in the back at any time!
